ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Song of Dawn
ygData.msgSnippet: it is the new alenia s disenchanting melody i guess, it does nothing yet hehe. brusco s bombastic bellow is on the FV vendor now, level 55 song.  it is a brass
ygData.messageBody:
it is the new alenia's disenchanting melody i guess, it does nothing yet
hehe.

brusco's bombastic bellow is on the FV vendor now, level 55 song. it is a
brass song that does 222 DD and 8 second stun, 5 minute recast time (what my
friend said spdat showed). he said the program he used shows it to require
a horn, but this program also says that for charm so it could be wrong.

Shada Powa, L52 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Okay... I give up - what does Song of Dawn do (or supposed to do)?
>
> Its (apprently) not:
> DoT
> Cancel Magic
> Debuff
> Buff
> Haste
> Slow
> Snare
> Stun
> Working Correctly :)
>
> -Tork@Nameless
>
> PS: I notice that castersrealm is missing some of the songs
